previews.name: Hawks
previews.heading: Atlanta Hawks
introParagraphs: The core trio of Alexander Volkov, Daniel Hamilton, and DeMarre Carroll gives the staff a clear identity to start from.
The front office kept the core intact and will lean on internal development.
No rotation regulars departed, so continuity remains a strength.
previews.coreStrength: The roster projects as league-average, but familiarity and defined roles should keep things steady.
previews.primaryRisk: The margin for error is slim if the shooting variance swings the wrong way.
previews.swingFactor: Daniel Hamilton's lead guard reps will determine how dynamic the offense looks.

ranking.statusLine: Holding | Staff intact | Banking on internal growth | Health risk: low
